body:
Comment 1 by **piotrnar**: 
It also seem to happen with 
go version go1.2.2 linux/amd64

===================
unexpected fault address 0x208bd05d
fatal error: fault
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x208bd05d pc=0x42ca04]

goroutine 1 [running]:
runtime.throw(0xdb9737)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:464 +0x69 fp=0x7fa7a318a758
runtime.sigpanic()
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/os_linux.c:237 +0xe9 fp=0x7fa7a318a770
runtime.memmove(0xc22708784f, 0x208bd055, 0x19)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/memmove_amd64.s:139 +0x214 fp=0x7fa7a318a778
bytes.(*Buffer).Write(0xc225979bd0, 0x208bd055, 0x19, 0x2f37, 0x19, ...)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/bytes/buffer.go:128 +0xaf fp=0x7fa7a318a7b8
github.com/piotrnar/gocoin/lib/chain.(*QdbRec).Serialize(0xc228c3f9c0,
0x94a8819be4720201, 0xed73b09623f58524, 0x5df409a4da6e895f, 0x9238afc001cd0d9f)
        /home/piotr/GOPATH/src/github.com/piotrnar/gocoin/lib/chain/qdb_record.go:159 +0x2c7 fp=0x7fa7a318a840
